column4: Hi - Trying to see if I can load Hardy Heron on a friends computer - It's the Live CD version. When it comes up almost to desktop it's asking for a username - it has never done this before on any computer I've always been able to start right up on the desktop to chec k and see if network card works, video, sound etc. any idea's ? ? ?
verify the integrity of the disk (from the first menu you see)
never had any problems with it before - looks pristine - but will try that - thx
